folder.help: Was this folder excluded from Blurhash generation?
folder.notQualified: This folder was excluded from generation

media.help: Is this media qualified and has not been excluded from Blurhash generation?
media.notQualified: This media is not qualified for Blurhash. Reason: {reason}

folder.label: Remove all
folder.help: Removes all generated Blurhashes in this folder
folder.notificationOnRemove: All Blurhashes of '{folderName}' were removed successfully

media.label: Remove
media.notificationOnRemove: The Blurhash for '{mediaName}' was removed successfully

folder.help: Generate missing Blurhashes for media in this folder
folder.helpForce: Generate and overwrite existing Blurhashes for media in this folder
folder.notificationOnGenerate: The images of the folder '{folderName}' were submitted for hash generation.
folder.notificationOnForceGenerate: The images of the folder '{folderName}' were submitted for hash regeneration. Existing hashes will be overridden.

media.helpForce: Generate and overwrite existing Blurhash for this media
media.notificationOnGenerate: The image '{mediaName}' was submitted for hash generation.
media.notificationOnForceGenerate: The image '{mediaName}' was submitted for hash regeneration.

hashGeneration.title: Blurhash generation
hashGeneration.message: No hash remaining. | One hash remaining ... | {n} hashes remaining ...

errors.EYECOOK_BLURHASH__ILLEGAL_MANUAL_MODE_LE: If the "Admin Worker" is deactivated in manual mode, Blurhash cannot be process.
